Banner1.BannerTitle:
Free rides at VR Park with
every Reel Cinema ticket!
Banner1.BannerInnerContent: “Guest can select 2 rides on any 2 from Dubai Drone, Dune Bash, Burj Drop, Drifters or selection of Video games upon loading a credit of AED 20”
Banner1.BannerPointsHeading: Present this voucher at VR Theme Park, level 2, The Dubai Mall, counters for redemption.
Banner1.BannerPoints: Valid for any Reel Cinemas, The Dubai Mall session and experience|Guests can select to ride on any 2 of: Dubai Drone, Burj Drop, Dune Bash & Drifters or a selection of video games upon loading a credit of AED 20|Redemption valid within 7 days of movie session|AED 5 card fee to get 2 free rides at VR Park|Limited time only
Banner1.RedirectUrlWithHeading: For full Terms & Conditions please visit vrparkdubai.com

Banner2.BannerTitle: 20% off your restaurant bill at Celebrity Chef Guy Fieri’s restaurant!
Banner2.BannerInnerContent: Serving Guy’s signature dishes & traditional American comfort food, from 11am until late at Reel Cinemas, The Dubai Mall, Level 3 | Please click here for more details and menu.
Banner2.BannerPointsHeading: Please click here for more details and menu.
Banner2.BannerPoints: Applicable on same day as movie or visit to attraction|Valid all days of the week, including public holidays|Valid on display of original voucher|Not valid in conjunction with any other offer
